metadata.title: CVE-2018-19211 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In ncurses 6.1, there is a NULL pointer dereference at function_nc_parse_entry in parse_entry.c that will lead to a denial of serviceattack. The product proceeds to the dereference code path even after a"dubious character `*' in name or alias field" detection.

criterions.comment: ncurses: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
